tool_description: A Beyblade API, providing access to information about various Beyblades, their product information, parts and other related data
name: beyblade-api
title: beyblade-api

api_list.name: /api/v1/beyblades

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: The number of Beyblades to skip

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of Beyblades to retrieve

api_list.name: /api/v1/beyblades/{id}

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: The ID of the Beyblade to retrieve
